articles.author: Viktoria Urban
articles.title: Solar Orbiter and BepiColombo to make history with double Venus flyby - SpaceWatch.Global
articles.description: Edinburgh, 4 August 2021. - Two spacecraft, Solar Orbiter and BepiColombo, will fly by Venus in August, in mission cooperations of three space agencies, ESA, NASA, and JAXA, the European agency said.
articles.content:
Source: ESA

articles.title: Greek heatwave: Seven deadly European summers - News24
articles.description: With Greece roasted by the worst heatwave in more than three decades and forest fires raging in neighbouring Turkey, we look at how Europe is being struck more often by extreme heat.
articles.content:
• Europe has had to deal with seven years of high summer temperatures since 2003.
  • In 2019, around 2 500 people died in extreme heat waves.
  • Spain hit 47°C in 2017.
